backend/main.mo: Defines hotel, room, booking, payment, invite token, and user profile types with storage maps and initial admin setup for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of human-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring metadata, favicon, root element, and main script entry point.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Regression testing checklist covering rollback verification, authentication, admin panel, hotel features, UI/UX, and performance.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes detailing v44 rollback, restored functionality, technical changes, verification steps, and previous version notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app shell, React Query client, and full route tree with authentication and role guards.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the current frontend build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays an admin table of all bookings with loading, error, and empty states plus booking details.
frontend/src/components/admin/CaffeineDe: Shows an admin notice about Caffeine deploy UI issues and provides cache-busting and reload options.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Provides admin tools to remove legacy room photos and payment methods using backend cleanup calls.
frontend/src/components/admin/Deployment: Shows build version and environment info with copy-to-clipboard actions for admin debugging.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Allows admins to view all hotels and toggle activation or update subscription status.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: UI for generating invite tokens, binding them to principals, and listing active/used tokens with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/PrincipalP: Admin panel for validating a principal ID and purging all associated hotel data after confirmation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays access-denied messaging based on user role and activation state, with navigation options and optional activation form.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Error screen shown when permission checks fail, allowing retry or navigation home.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form for validating and consuming invite tokens to activate a hotel account, triggering query refresh and navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate component requiring new authenticated users to fill out basic profile info before accessing children content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that checks Internet Identity authentication and prompts login if the user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards child components by checking user identity, role, admin status, and optional hotel activation, showing loading or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Displays a dialog with detailed booking info including dates, price, guest data, and optional guest principal copying.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Handles booking creation with form validation, price calculation, date checks, and submission to the booking API.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge showing a booking’s status with mapped labels and visual variants.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Shows the user’s bookings with status, details dialog, and cancel actions, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Displays a modal dialog showing a full‑size preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays real‑time authentication, role, admin status, and hotel profile diagnostics for debugging.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays hotel bookings, allows confirming or canceling them, and handles loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages hotel payment methods with add/remove functionality and profile updates.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Shows and edits hotel profile fields including name, location, address, map link, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Static panel informing that stay recording is unavailable until backend support exists.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with previewing and optional editing, deletion, and replacement features.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Handles creating, editing, and deleting hotel rooms, including pricing, promotions, and photo management.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges, alerts, and admin contact card based on fetched profile data.
Provides page layout with top navigation, main content area, and footer showing build version.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a simple language selector allowing users to switch locale, currently only English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing routes and login/logout actions based on authentication, admin, and hotel activation state.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription management.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and provides quick access to WhatsApp or email contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, role, and hotel data, including helper converters for backend types.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements image upload logic with size/type validation, progress tracking, and error handling for room photos.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Defines a locale context storing the current language in localStorage with a provider and hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user account info, roles, hotel activation status, and admin tools with refresh and copy actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, bookings, cleanup, and deployment info.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists all hotels with representative images, handling loading states, image errors, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest booking tools and links to browse hotels or view account status, plus the user’s bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Renders the hotel management dashboard with tabs for profile, rooms, bookings, payments, and subscription, handling loading, errors, and deactivated accounts.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays public hotel details, contact info, rooms, and booking form, loading the hotel by route param and handling missing hotels.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Shows the main entry menu for guests and hotel owners, routing users based on authentication, role, and activation status.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's bookings table with quick links to browse hotels and view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums representing backend hotel, room, booking, and subscription data structures.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Enables debug mode based on environment or a URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency symbols, formatting, and validation utilities for displaying money values.
frontend/src/utils/roomBlobStorage.ts: Temporary file-upload utilities that convert images to data URLs, with support for progress callbacks and multi-file uploads.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking failures of room picture URLs for display.
frontend/src/utils/roomPricing.ts: Bigint-safe utilities for validating promo percentages and computing discounted room prices.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, issues, and pending requests for the Hotel Admin Portal, including deployment concerns and new feature tasks.
